snippet.title: Walpurgis Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Walpurgis is...
## A gameplay mod that works with Doom, Hexen and Heretic, with GZDoom straight out of the Box!
## Focused on giving everything three fire-modes without needing any extra resources!
## Strong and fun, but balanced. 
## Gothically medieval, with a taste of moderate-high fantasy. 
## Based around play where you get used to using both your arsenal and your inventory items in tandem!
## Rigorously playtested with custom doom, heretic, and hexen wads!
## Is named after Walpurgisnacht!

Get it here: https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=43&t=67025
Or here: https://www.doomworld.com/forum/topic/111766/
